resources.string: Support percentages vary between users. Use these examples to guide your character choices and configurations.\n\nNote: More supports will be added in the future.
You can filter for characters by their class.\n\nNote: More characters will be added in the future.
You can search for medal sets that are suitable for each class.\n\nNote: More sets will be added in the future.
Note that these recommendations may change as more medals are introduced to the game
Note that these recommendations may change if this character gets buffed or nerfed in the future.
